devdoc.author: @apoorvlathey
devdoc.details: lockId's: 0: deposit & depositWithPermit2 1: depositWithNFT 2: withdraw 3: collectWethFees

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

receiveRewards(uint256,uint256,bool).details: Can only be called by feeDistributor, after it sends the reward tokens to this contract

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_nextId.details: The ID of the next token that will be minted. Skips 0

earlyWithdrawPenaltyInWei.details: the max penalty applicable. The penalty goes down linearly as the `timelockedUntil` approaches

devdoc.title: NFTX Inventory Staking V3

depositWithNFT(uint256,uint256[],address.notice: This contract must be on the feeExclusion list to avoid mint fees, else revert

withdraw(uint256,uint256,uint256[]).notice: This contract must be on the feeExclusion list to avoid redeem fees, else revert

userdoc.notice: Allows users to stake vTokens to earn fees in vTokens and WETH. The position is minted as xNFT.
